So, I need to find someone willing to make that commitment because it is hard work.... It is important to me that I have people I can trust in terms of their expertise and their gut feeling. It is a difficult decision when you are putting a team around you. I also think it is important on show like this that you have people who are competitive with each other because essentially, the judges are taking part in this competition as well as the competitors. It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat, Wise said. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as chief executive by co-founder Larry Page, 37. I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. He added looters had also ransacked the ticket office. More distracted TTC driver photos surface
